subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Ivica Kostelic erased a huge deficit in the slalom leg to win a World Cup super combined race on Sunday to clinch the skiing discipline title in Chamonix, France.
snippet: Ivica Kostelic erased a huge deficit in the slalom leg to win a World Cup super combined race on Sunday to clinch the skiing discipline title in Chamonix, France.
